entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pangnirtung
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 a.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pangnirtung Airport 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: E 47 km/h gust 67 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
